text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed ʙa Alloh va rasuli Ū va ʙa şariati Ū amal kardaed, xudro ʙa amal kardan dar to'ati Alloh va dur şudan az nofarmonii Ū nigoh dored. Agar cande mardum şumoro qaʙul nakunand amal kardanro davom dihed, hidojat joftaed. Va cun rohi rostro lozim girifted va amri ʙa ma'ruf va nahji az munkar karded, heç goh onon, ki gumroh mondaand, ʙa şumo zijone narasonand. Bozgaşti hamai şumo nazdi Alloh ast, to şumoro ʙa on korho, ki mekardaed, ogoh gardonad
